short_summary: The director project delivery command and control infrastructure portfolio within the department of national defense requires a senior 5.4 professional engineer to design and implement security systems
description: The director project delivery command and control infrastructure portfolio within the department of national defense has a requirement for a senior five point four professional engineer to assist in the design and implementation of the security system for various projects that they support
full_summary:
**Procurement Title** 
====================
Notified Proposal Request - Professional Engineer Services
---------------------------------------------------------

**Project Identifier**
---------------------

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01017563
* **Solicitation Number**: W6369-23DE24
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Publication Date**: December 16, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 6, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Budget and Funding**: Not specified
* **Trade Agreements**: Contracts in compliance with the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and other applicable trade agreements
* **Regions of Operation**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Notice Description**
----------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks a professional engineer to provide services for the design, development, and improvement of security systems for various projects supported by DND. The selected candidate will work on security and access control systems to meet specific project requirements.

**Service Requirements**
---------------------

*   Design, develop, and improve existing DND security systems
*   Implement security and access control systems for new projects
*   Ensure project security systems meet DND requirements
*   Collaborate with DND to identify security needs and develop solutions

**Ability to Deliver**
---------------------

*   Strong expertise in system engineering services, security systems, and related frameworks
*   Proven experience designing and developing effective security systems
*   Ability to meet project deadlines and budget constraints
*   Demonstrated understanding of DND security requirements

**Proposal Submission**
---------------------

*   Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GetS)
*   The task-based NPP template should be used for proposal preparation and submission
*   Referrals to the attached documents are available at: [link]

Optional Attachments are extracted from the above document and formatted with nice headings.

Attachments
-----------

General

*   Annex Report [Language]
*   Purchase and Sales details

**Security agreements between Canada & the World**
-----------------------------------------------

Protocols to provide Information to the World about our VIPs
